meanings.definition: A type of cherry preserved in maraschino liqueur.
meanings.sent1: I love the sweet taste of maraschinos on top of my ice cream.
meanings.sent2: The bartender added a couple of maraschinos to my cocktail for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The maraschinos in the dessert were like little bursts of happiness.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the unexpected sweetness of biting into a maraschino.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the maraschinos made the dish look festive.

meanings.definition: A cocktail garnish made from maraschino cherries.
meanings.sent1: The bartender placed two maraschinos on the rim of the glass.
meanings.sent2: The fruity flavor of maraschinos enhances the taste of the drink.
meanings.sent3: The maraschinos on top made the cocktail look fancy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as delightful as the maraschinos floating in the drink.
meanings.sent5: The maraschinos added a pop of color to the otherwise plain cocktail.

meanings.definition: A sweet liqueur made from marasca cherries.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed sipping on maraschinos after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The maraschinos liqueur had a rich and indulgent flavor.
meanings.sent3: The maraschinos liqueur was so delicious, it felt like a treat.
meanings.sent4: The warmth of the maraschinos liqueur spread through her chest.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the maraschinos liqueur filled the room with sweetness.
